name: Chronogunner
description:
Chronogunner is a fast paced bullet hell space scroller in retro wave style. Infinite waves, how long will you survive?

This is the result of a small practice jam where the entire team did completely new roles that we had little to no experience in. 

A fun way of learning about other roles, gaining perspective - highly recommended.

We hope you enjoy this free proof of concept.

Built with Unreal Engine.

Key Mappings:

Space: Fire

1:  Bolter Gun

2: Spray Gun

3: Homing Bombs

E: Chronobomb 

Escape/6: Menu
